summary.span: 提供多种使用和发布远程对象及代理的方法。

span.span: Provides several methods for using and publishing remoted objects and proxies.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非您是处理激活、生存期管理或事务等问题的服务提供程序，否则不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Unless you are a service provider dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, or transactions, you do not need to distinguish between proxy references and object references. 远程处理基础结构使用透明代理，该代理给出远程对象驻留在客户端空间中的印象。The remoting infrastructure uses transparent proxies that give the impression that the remote objects reside in the client's space. 代理通过将对它们进行的调用转发到远程位置的实际对象来实现此目的。Proxies achieve this by forwarding calls made on them to the real objects at remote locations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 为对象创建 称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过通道传输到另一个应用程序域（可能在其他进程或计算机上）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中，必须对 进行分析，以便为该对象创建一个代理，该代理通常连接到实际对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为 "取消封送"。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 在取消封送过程中，将对 进行分析以提取远程对象的方法信息，并创建透明代理和 对象。During unmarshaling, the is parsed to extract the method information of the remote object and both the transparent proxy and objects are created. 包含描述正在被封送处理的对象的 和类的信息、唯一标识特定对象实例的 URI 以及有关如何访问该对象所在的远程应用程序的通信相关信息。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remote application where the object is located. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取指定对象的 实例。The following code example demonstrates how to get a instance for the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices.GetObjRefForProxy/VB/client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任何类型的远程处理边界上使用对象的客户端实际使用的是对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理提供实际对象在客户端空间中所驻留的印象。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它通过使用远程处理基础结构将对其进行的调用转发到实际对象来实现此目标。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理由 类型的托管运行时类的实例支持。The transparent proxy is backed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的部分功能。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承托管对象的关联语义，如垃圾回收、对成员和方法的支持，并可进行扩展以形成新的类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 代理充当与远程对象（透明代理）相同的类的对象，也是托管对象。The proxy acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and is also a managed object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上下文是一系列有序属性，这些属性定义驻留在其中的对象的环境。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects that reside inside it. 上下文是在对象的激活过程中创建的，这些对象配置为需要某些自动服务，例如同步、事务、实时激活、安全等。Contexts are created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services such synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 多个对象可以存留在一个上下文内。Multiple objects can live inside a context. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices IsObject Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RemotingServices IsObject Snippets/VB/class1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用单向方法时，客户端不会等待服务器处理完消息。When a one-way method is called, the client does not wait for the server to finish processing the message. 客户端方法返回到应用程序，并且不知道服务器是否将成功处理消息。The client method returns to the application with no knowledge of whether or not the server will successfully process the message. 方法使用 进行标记。Methods are marked as one way using the . 单向方法不能有返回值或任何输出参数。One-way methods cannot have a return value or any out parameters. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CPP/remotingservicessample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/CS/remotingservicessample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingServices/VB/remotingservicessample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 返回一个布尔值，该值指示给定的对象是透明代理还是实际对象。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the object specified in the parameter is a transparent proxy or a real object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象的任何类型的远程处理边界的客户端实际上使用的是对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理提供实际对象在客户端空间中所驻留的印象。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它通过使用远程处理基础结构将对其进行的调用转发到实际对象来实现此目标。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理本身由 类型的托管运行时类的实例驻留。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的部分功能。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象继承托管对象的关联语义，如垃圾回收、对成员和方法的支持，并可进行扩展以形成新的类。A proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for members and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 因此，代理具有双重性质;一方面，它需要充当与远程对象（透明代理）相同的类的对象，另一种方法是托管对象本身。Thus the proxy has a dual nature; on the one hand it needs to act as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and on the other it is a managed object itself. 代理对象可在不考虑 中的任何远程处理细分的情况下使用。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 应用程序不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 不过，处理诸如激活、生存期管理和事务等问题的服务提供商需要进行这种区分。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法来确定对象是代理还是实际对象。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to determine whether an object is a proxy or a real object. 有关完整的示例代码，请参阅 类的示例。For the complete example code, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CPP/ad.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/CS/ad.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AsyncResult.NewExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AsyncResult.NewExamples/VB/ad.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 为对象创建 称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过通道传输到另一个应用程序域（可能在其他进程或计算机上）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中，必须对 进行分析，以便为该对象创建一个代理，该代理通常连接到实际对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为 "取消封送"。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 包含描述正在被封送处理的对象的 和类的信息、唯一标识特定对象实例的 URI 以及有关如何访问该对象所在的远程处理细分的通信相关信息。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 在封送处理期间，将使用当前线程中的上下文，而不是创建对象时处于活动状态的上下文。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 如果 方法未显式设置 URI，则由远程处理标识基础结构自动生成。If a URI was not explicitly set by the method, it is automatically generated by the remoting identity infrastructure. 由于以下两个原因之一，你无法将 URI 与代理关联：要么是在服务器端为它所表示的对象生成了 URI，要么该对象是已知的，在这种情况下，URI 是已知的。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 出于此原因，如果 `Obj` 参数为代理，则会引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 对于自定义代理，此限制非常宽松，因为透明代理被视为服务器对象。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是用于跨应用程序域边界传输对象引用的对象的可序列化表示形式。A is a serializable representation of an object used to transfer an object reference across an application domain boundary. 为对象创建 称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 可以通过通道传输到另一个应用程序域（可能在其他进程或计算机上）。The can be transferred through a channel into another application domain (possibly on another process or computer). 在其他应用程序域中，必须对 进行分析，以便为该对象创建一个代理，该代理通常连接到实际对象。Once in the other application domain, the must be parsed to create a proxy for the object, generally connected to the real object. 此操作称为 "取消封送"。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 包含描述正在被封送处理的对象的 和类的信息、唯一标识特定对象实例的 URI 以及有关如何访问该对象所在的远程处理细分的通信相关信息。A contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, a URI that uniquely identifies the specific object instance, and communication related information about how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 指定的 由远程处理基础结构用来限制公开的类型层次结构的作用域。The specified is used by the remoting infrastructure to limit the scope of the exposed type hierarchy. 例如，如果对象 A 从对象 B 派生，而后者是从对象 C 派生的，并且调用了 ，则客户端可以将代理强制转换为 C 和 B，而不是转换为。For example, if object A derives from object B, which derives from object C, and is called, then the client can cast the proxy between C and B but not to A. 在封送处理期间，将使用当前线程中的上下文，而不是创建对象时处于活动状态的上下文。During marshaling, the context from the current thread is used, not the context that was active when the object was created. 由于以下两个原因之一，你无法将 URI 与代理关联：要么是在服务器端为它所表示的对象生成了 URI，要么该对象是已知的，在这种情况下，URI 是已知的。You cannot associate a URI with a proxy for one of two reasons: either the URI was generated at the server side for the object it represents, or the object is well known, in which case the URI is known. 出于此原因，如果 `Obj` 参数为代理，则会引发异常。For this reason, if the `Obj` parameter is a proxy, an exception will be thrown. 对于自定义代理，此限制非常宽松，因为透明代理被视为服务器对象。For custom proxies this restriction is relaxed because the transparent proxy is treated as the server object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当封送处理给定的对象时，将使用当前方法设置的 URI。The URI set by the current method is used when marshaling the given object. 封送处理后，将指定对象的 URI 设置为追加到当前 的 上的 `uri` 参数中的字符串。After marshaling, the URI of the specified object is set to the string in the `uri` parameter appended onto the of the current . 如果当前应用程序正在侦听 HTTP 端口，则 `uri` 参数中指定的字符串和追加到当前 的 的 `uri` 字符串都将路由到指定的对象。If the current application is listening on an HTTP port, then both the string specified in the `uri` parameter and the `uri` string appended onto the of the current route to the specified object. 例如，如果应用程序正在侦听 HTTP 端口9000，则 `http://localhost:9000/objectUri`和 `http://localhost:9000//objectUri` 路由到 `obj` 参数中指定的对象。For example, if the application is listening on HTTP port 9000, then both `http://localhost:9000/objectUri`, and `http://localhost:9000//objectUri` route to the object specified in the `obj` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置在封送指定的对象时 方法将使用的 URI。The following code example demonstrates how to set the URI that will be used by the method when marshaling the specified object. [!code-cpp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/RemotingServices.SetObjectUriForMarshal/VB/source.vb#1)]
